Instruction: Heat sesame oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add diced onion and diced bell pepper to the skillet and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, or until softened.
Push the vegetables to one side of the skillet and crack the eggs into the empty space.
Scramble the eggs until cooked through, then mix them with the vegetables.
Add cooked shrimp, cooked rice, diced pineapple, and frozen peas to the skillet.
Drizzle soy sauce over the ingredients in the skillet and stir-fry for another 3-4 minutes, or until everything is heated through.
Season the pineapple fried rice with salt and black pepper to taste.
Garnish the dish with sliced green onions before serving.
Serve the pineapple fried rice hot as a deliciously flavorful side dish.
